 """
 This script is aimed to generate the coordinates and the properties necessary to
 display correctly the PlaningBox in HTML style (i.e using HTML code + CSS class
 for positionning). The process is based on the strucutre passed in parameter (i.e
 'structure').
 Beware this only generates a dict based structure, and need to be passed through
 the CSS script ('planning_css') to have CSS compliant code, no HTML generation is
 done in this script.
 
 This script is also used by the validator script in order to recover the
 groups of moved blocks
 """
 
 # the following values are hard-defined and can be modified if necessary to comply with
 # special constraints (big fonts for example)
 car_height = 10 # caracter height
 car_width = 6 # caracter width
 depth_width = 10 # space to insert between each depth
 depth_height = 10 # the same over the vertical axis
 block_width = 40 # mid block size in wich we try to insert text
 margin = 5 # margin between the block and the delimitation (this permits to have
 # blocks a bit smaller that lines or columns)
 
 
 
 size_planning_width = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_planning_width')
 size_x_axis_height = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_x_axis_height')
 size_x_axis_space = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_x_axis_space')
 size_border_width_left = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_border_width_left')
 size_header_height = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_header_height')
 size_planning_height = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_planning_height')
 size_y_axis_width = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_y_axis_width')
 size_y_axis_space = structure.basic.field.get_value('size_y_axis_space')
 y_axis_position = structure.basic.field.get_value('y_axis_position')
 if y_axis_position == 'right':
 y_axis_position = 1
 else:
 y_axis_position = 0
 x_axis_position = structure.basic.field.get_value('x_axis_position')
 if x_axis_position == 'top':
 x_axis_position = 1
 else:
 x_axis_position = 0
 
 
 properties_structure = {}
 properties_structure['base'] = {}
 properties_structure['frame'] = {}
 properties_structure['main_axis'] = {}
 properties_structure['secondary_axis'] = {}
 properties_structure['line'] = {}
 properties_structure['content'] = {}
 properties_structure['info'] = {}
 
 
 # getting number of elements to display on the main axis
 if structure.planning.main_axis.size != structure.basic.main_axis_info['bound_axis_groups']:
 # number of groups to display over the main axis is different from the expected
 # value : updating planning size to fit exactly the number of groups 
 if structure.planning.main_axis == structure.planning.Y:
 # updating Y axis
 main_axis_step = float(size_planning_height) / float(structure.basic.main_axis_info['bound_axis_groups'])
 size_planning_height = main_axis_step * structure.planning.main_axis.size
 else:
 main_axis_step = float(size_planning_width) / float(structure.basic.main_axis_info['bound_axis_groups'])
 size_planning_width = main_axis_step * structure.planning.main_axis.size
 else:
 if structure.planning.main_axis == structure.planning.Y:
 main_axis_step = float(size_planning_height) / float(structure.basic.main_axis_info['bound_axis_groups'])
 else:
 main_axis_step = float(size_planning_width) / float(structure.basic.main_axis_info['bound_axis_groups'])
 
 # defining planning area CSS class
 planning_dict=None
 planning_dict= {}
 planning_dict['position'] = 'relative'
 planning_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 planning_dict['border-color'] = '#000000'
 planning_dict['border-width'] = 0
 planning_dict['background'] = '#d5e6de'
 planning_dict['width'] = size_planning_width + size_border_width_left + size_y_axis_width + size_y_axis_space
 planning_dict['height'] = size_header_height + size_x_axis_height + size_x_axis_space + size_planning_height + 100
 planning_dict['margin-top'] = 0
 planning_dict['margin-left'] = 0
 properties_structure['base']['header'] = planning_dict
 
 # recovering axis CSS class informations
 for axis in (structure.planning.Y, structure.planning.X):
 axis_dict= None
 axis_dict= {}
 axis_previous = None
 axis_previous = {}
 axis_next = None
 axis_next = {}
 axis_depth = None
 axis_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 axis_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 axis_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 axis_dict['border-width'] = 0
 axis_dict['background'] = '#d5e6de'
 # adding cursors position informations
 axis_previous['position'] = 'absolute'
 axis_previous['border-width'] = 0
 axis_next['position'] = 'absolute'
 axis_next['border-width'] = 0
 if axis == structure.planning.X:
 # current axis is X axis
 # positionning it
 axis_dict['width'] = size_planning_width
 axis_dict['height'] = size_x_axis_height
 if x_axis_position:
 axis_dict['margin-top'] = size_header_height
 else:
 axis_dict['margin-top'] = size_header_height + size_planning_height + size_x_axis_space
 if y_axis_position:
 axis_dict['margin-left'] = size_border_width_left
 else:
 axis_dict['margin-left'] = size_border_width_left + size_y_axis_width + size_y_axis_space
 
 axis_previous['margin-left'] = -20
 axis_previous['margin-top'] = (axis_dict['height'] - 15) / 2
 axis_next['margin-left'] = axis_dict['width'] + 5
 axis_next['margin-top'] = axis_previous['margin-top']
 
 if axis == structure.planning.main_axis:
 # current axis is main axis : need to implement depth widget
 axis_depth = {}
 axis_depth['margin-left'] = -10
 axis_depth['margin-top'] = 0
 axis_depth['broder-width'] = 0
 axis_depth['position'] = 'absolute'
 # updating axis previous values
 axis_previous['margin-left'] = axis_previous['margin-left'] - 10
 else:
 # current axis is Y axis
 # positionning it
 axis_dict['width'] = size_y_axis_width
 axis_dict['height'] = size_planning_height
 if x_axis_position:
 axis_dict['margin-top'] = size_header_height + size_x_axis_height + size_x_axis_space
 else:
 axis_dict['margin-top'] = size_header_height
 if y_axis_position:
 axis_dict['margin-left'] = size_border_width_left + size_planning_width + size_y_axis_space
 else:
 axis_dict['margin-left'] = size_border_width_left
 
 
 axis_previous['margin-left'] = (axis_dict['width'] -15) / 2
 axis_previous['margin-top'] = -20
 axis_next['margin-left'] = axis_previous['margin-left']
 axis_next['margin-top'] = axis_dict['height'] + 5
 if axis == structure.planning.main_axis:
 axis_depth = {}
 axis_depth['margin-left'] = 0
 axis_depth['margin-top'] = -15
 axis_depth['border-width'] = 0
 axis_depth['position'] = 'absolute'
 # updating axis previous values
 axis_previous['margin-top'] = axis_previous['margin-top'] - 10
 # adding axis_definitions to dictionnary
 properties_structure['frame'][axis.name] = axis_dict
 properties_structure['frame'][axis.name + '_previous'] = axis_previous
 properties_structure['frame'][axis.name + '_next'] = axis_next
 if axis_depth != None:
 properties_structure['frame'][axis.name + '_depth'] = axis_depth
 
 
 # now processing groups over the main axis, including their info object
 # at the same time generating line to separate each group
 for axis_group in structure.planning.main_axis.axis_group:
 axis_group_dict=None
 axis_group_dict={}
 axis_group_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 axis_group_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 axis_group_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 axis_group_dict['border-width'] = 1
 axis_group_dict['background'] = '#d5e6de'
 if axis_group.property_dict['stat'] == 1 :
 axis_group_dict['background'] = '#ddefe7'
 # info definition
 axis_info_dict= {}
 axis_info_dict['position'] = 'absolute'
 axis_info_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 axis_info_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 axis_info_dict['border-width'] = 0
 # group line separator definition
 axis_line_dict=None
 axis_line_dict = {}
 axis_line_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 axis_line_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 axis_line_dict['border-right-width'] = 0
 axis_line_dict['border-bottom-width'] = 0
 if structure.planning.main_axis == structure.planning.X:
 # current axis is X axis
 axis_group_dict['width'] = float(axis_group.axis_element_number) * main_axis_step
 axis_group_dict['margin-left'] = float( axis_group.axis_element_start -1) * main_axis_step
 axis_group_dict['height'] = size_x_axis_height #- axis_group.depth * depth_height * 2
 axis_group_dict['margin-top'] = 0 #axis_group.depth * depth_height * 2
 axis_info_dict['margin-top'] = axis_group.depth * depth_height
 axis_info_dict['margin-left'] = 1
 # dotted line must be vertical
 if axis_group.depth == 0 :
 #current group is main group : line must be bold
 axis_line_dict['border-left-width'] = 2
 else:
 axis_line_dict['border-left-width'] = 1
 axis_line_dict['border-top-width'] = 0
 axis_line_dict['height'] = size_planning_height
 axis_line_dict['width'] = 0
 axis_line_dict['margin-left'] = axis_group_dict['margin-left']
 axis_line_dict['margin-top'] = 0
 
 # processing depth
 for depth in range(axis_group.depth):
 axis_depth_dict = None
 axis_depth_dict = {}
 axis_depth_dict['position'] = 'absolute'
 #axis_depth_dict['border_style'] = 'solid'
 #axis_depth_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 #axis_depth_dict['border-right-width'] = 0
 #axis_depth_dict['border-left-width'] = 0
 #axis_depth_dict['border-top-width'] = 1
 #axis_depth_dict['border-bottom-width'] = 0
 axis_depth_dict['background'] = '#53676e'
 axis_depth_dict['margin-top'] = (depth +1) * depth_height
 axis_depth_dict['margin-left'] = 0
 axis_depth_dict['width'] = axis_group_dict['width']
 axis_depth_dict['height'] = 1
 
 # adding current depth line info to properties structure
 properties_structure['info'][axis_group.name + '_depth_' + str(depth)] = axis_depth_dict
 
 
 # updating info size
 if axis_group_dict['height'] - axis_info_dict['margin-top'] < car_height:
 # block height is too low to be able to display any text
 # removing block title but keeping tooltip
 axis_group.info_title.edit('')
 else:
 # height matches info
 if len(axis_group.info_title.info) * car_width > axis_group_dict['width']:
 # defining number of caracts to leave
 nb = max((axis_group_dict['width'] - car_width * 3) / car_width, 0 )
 # cutting activity
 axis_group.info_title.edit(axis_group.info_title.info[:int(nb)] + '..')
 
 
 if axis_group.axis_element_number > 1:
 # subgroups are present
 for axis_element_number in range(axis_group.axis_element_number)[1:]:
 # iterating each subgroup except the first one
 # for each of them, building a new line over the axis as a delimiter
 axis_element_dict = None
 axis_element_dict = {}
 axis_element_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 axis_element_dict['border-right-width'] = 1
 axis_element_dict['border-bottom-width'] = 1
 axis_element_dict['border-left-width'] = 2
 axis_element_dict['border-top-width'] = 1
 axis_element_dict['border-style'] = 'dotted'
 axis_element_dict['width'] = 0
 axis_element_dict['height'] = size_planning_height
 axis_element_dict['margin-left'] = axis_group_dict['margin-left'] + axis_element_number * main_axis_step
 axis_element_dict['margin-top'] = 0
 
 # adding current sub line info to properties_structure
 properties_structure['line'][axis_group.name + '_line_' + str(axis_element_number)] = axis_element_dict
 
 else:
 # current axis is Y axis
 axis_group_dict['margin-left'] = 0 #axis_group.depth * depth_width * 2
 axis_group_dict['width'] = size_y_axis_width #- axis_group.depth * depth_width * 2
 axis_group_dict['margin-top'] = float( axis_group.axis_element_start - 1) * main_axis_step
 axis_group_dict['height'] = float( axis_group.axis_element_number) * main_axis_step
 
 # positionning info object in the middle of the axisGroup
 axis_info_dict['margin-top'] = ((float(axis_group_dict['height']) - car_height ) / 2.0)
 axis_info_dict['margin-left'] = axis_group.depth * depth_width + depth_width / 2
 
 # main line must be horizontal
 if axis_group.depth == 0:
 axis_line_dict['border-top-width'] = 2
 else:
 axis_line_dict['border-top-width'] = 1
 axis_line_dict['border-left-width'] = 0
 axis_line_dict['width'] = size_planning_width
 axis_line_dict['height'] = 0
 axis_line_dict['margin-left'] = 0
 axis_line_dict['margin-top'] = axis_group_dict['margin-top']
 
 
 # processing depth
 for depth in range(axis_group.depth):
 axis_depth_dict = None
 axis_depth_dict = {}
 axis_depth_dict['position'] = 'absolute'
 #axis_depth_dict['border_style'] = 'solid'
 #axis_depth_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 #axis_depth_dict['border-right-width'] = 0
 #axis_depth_dict['border-left-width'] = 1
 #axis_depth_dict['border-top-width'] = 0
 #axis_depth_dict['border-bottom-width'] = 0
 #axis_depth_dict['border-width'] = 2
 axis_depth_dict['background'] = '#53676e'
 axis_depth_dict['margin-top'] = 1
 axis_depth_dict['margin-left'] = (depth +1) * depth_width
 axis_depth_dict['width'] = 1
 axis_depth_dict['height'] = axis_group_dict['height']
 
 # adding current depth line info to properties structure
 properties_structure['info'][axis_group.name + '_depth_' + str(depth)] = axis_depth_dict
 
 
 
 # updating info size
 if axis_group_dict['height'] < car_height:
 # block height is too low to be able to display any text
 # removing block title but keeping tooltip
 axis_group.info_title.edit('')
 else:
 # height matches info
 if len(axis_group.info_title.info) * car_width > axis_group_dict['width']:
 # defining number of caracts to leave
 nb = max((axis_group_dict['width'] - car_width * 3) / car_width, 0 )
 # cutting activity
 axis_group.info_title.edit(axis_group.info_title.info[:int(nb)] + '..')
 
 
 
 if axis_group.axis_element_number > 1:
 # subgroup are present
 for axis_element_number in range(axis_group.axis_element_number)[1:]:
 # iterating each subgroup except the first one
 # for each of them, building a new line over the axis as a delimiter
 axis_element_dict = None
 axis_element_dict = {}
 axis_element_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 axis_element_dict['border-right-width'] = 0
 axis_element_dict['border-bottom-width'] = 0
 axis_element_dict['border-left-width'] = 0
 axis_element_dict['border-top-width'] = 1
 axis_element_dict['border-style'] = 'dotted'
 axis_element_dict['width'] = size_planning_width
 axis_element_dict['height'] = 0
 axis_element_dict['margin-left'] = 0
 axis_element_dict['margin-top'] = axis_group_dict['margin-top'] + axis_element_number * main_axis_step
 
 # adding current sub line info to properties_structure
 properties_structure['line'][axis_group.name + '_line_' + str(axis_element_number)] = axis_element_dict
 
 
 # adding axis_definitions to dictionnary
 properties_structure['main_axis'][axis_group.name] = axis_group_dict
 properties_structure['line'][axis_group.name + '_line'] = axis_line_dict
 properties_structure['info'][axis_group.name + '_info'] = axis_info_dict
 
 
 
 # processing secondary_axis_group
 for sec_axis_group in structure.planning.secondary_axis.axis_group:
 sec_axis_group_dict=None
 sec_axis_group_dict={}
 sec_axis_group_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 sec_axis_group_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 sec_axis_group_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 sec_axis_group_dict['border-width'] = 1
 sec_axis_group_dict['background'] = '#d5e6de'
 # info definition
 sec_axis_info_dict= {}
 sec_axis_info_dict['position'] = 'absolute'
 sec_axis_info_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 sec_axis_info_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 sec_axis_info_dict['border-width'] = 0
 # line definition
 sec_axis_line_dict=None
 sec_axis_line_dict = {}
 sec_axis_line_dict['position']= 'absolute'
 if sec_axis_group.delimiter_type == 0:
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-style'] = 'dotted'
 else:
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-right-width'] = 0
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-bottom-width'] = 0
 if structure.planning.main_axis == structure.planning.Y:
 # current axis is X axis
 sec_axis_group_dict['width'] = sec_axis_group.position_secondary.absolute_range * size_planning_width
 sec_axis_group_dict['margin-left'] = sec_axis_group.position_secondary.absolute_begin * size_planning_width
 sec_axis_group_dict['height'] = size_x_axis_height
 sec_axis_group_dict['margin-top'] = sec_axis_group.depth
 sec_axis_info_dict['margin-top'] = 1
 sec_axis_info_dict['margin-left'] = 1
 # dotted line must be vertical
 if sec_axis_group.delimiter_type == 2:
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-left-width'] = 2
 else:
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-left-width'] = 1
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-top-width'] = 0
 sec_axis_line_dict['height'] = size_planning_height
 sec_axis_line_dict['width'] = 0
 sec_axis_line_dict['margin-left'] = sec_axis_group_dict['margin-left']
 sec_axis_line_dict['margin-top'] = 0
 
 # updating info size
 if sec_axis_group_dict['height'] - sec_axis_info_dict['margin-top'] < car_height:
 # block height is too low to be able to display any text
 # removing block title but keeping tooltip
 sec_axis_group.info_title.edit('')
 else:
 # height matches info
 if len(sec_axis_group.info_title.info) * car_width > sec_axis_group_dict['width']:
 # defining number of caracts to leave
 nb = max((sec_axis_group_dict['width'] - car_width * 3) / car_width, 0 )
 # cutting activity
 sec_axis_group.info_title.edit(sec_axis_group.info_title.info[:int(nb)] + '..')
 
 else:
 # current axis is Y axis
 sec_axis_group_dict['margin-left'] = sec_axis_group.depth
 sec_axis_group_dict['width'] = size_y_axis_width
 sec_axis_group_dict['margin-top'] = sec_axis_group.position_secondary.absolute_begin * size_planning_height
 sec_axis_group_dict['height'] = sec_axis_group.position_secondary.absolute_range * size_planning_height
 # positionning info object in the middle of the axisGroup
 sec_axis_info_dict['margin-top'] = ((float(axis_group_dict['height']) - car_height ) / 2.0)
 sec_axis_info_dict['margin-left'] = 1
 # dotted line must be horizontal
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-left-width'] = 0
 if sec_axis_group.delimiter_type == 2:
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-top-width'] = 2
 else:
 sec_axis_line_dict['border-top-width'] = 1
 sec_axis_line_dict['width'] = size_planning_width
 sec_axis_line_dict['height'] = 0
 sec_axis_line_dict['margin-left'] = 0
 sec_axis_line_dict['margin-top'] = sec_axis_group_dict['margin-top']
 
 
 # updating info size
 if sec_axis_group_dict['height'] < car_height:
 # block height is too low to be able to display any text
 # removing block title but keeping tooltip
 sec_axis_group.info_title.edit('')
 else:
 # height matches info
 if len(sec_axis_group.info_title.info) * car_width > sec_axis_group_dict['width']:
 # defining number of caracts to leave
 nb = max((sec_axis_group_dict['width'] - car_width * 3) / car_width, 0 )
 # cutting activity
 sec_axis_group.info_title.edit(sec_axis_group.info_title.info[:int(nb)] + '..')
 
 
 ## testing if text can be displayed in current group
 #if len(sec_axis_group.title) * car_width > sec_axis_group_dict['width']:
 # # defining number of caracts to leave
 # nb = max((sec_axis_group_dict['width'] - car_width * 3) / car_width, 0)
 # # cutting activity
 # sec_axis_group.setTitle(sec_axis_group.title[:int(nb)] + '..')
 
 # adding axis_definitions to dictionnary
 properties_structure['secondary_axis'][sec_axis_group.name] = sec_axis_group_dict
 properties_structure['line'][sec_axis_group.name + '_line'] = sec_axis_line_dict
 properties_structure['info'][sec_axis_group.name + '_info'] = sec_axis_info_dict
 
 
 
 
 
 # defining CSS properties for content
 content_dict=None
 content_dict={}
 content_dict['position'] = 'absolute'
 content_dict['width'] = size_planning_width
 content_dict['height'] = size_planning_height
 if y_axis_position:
 content_dict['margin-left'] = size_border_width_left
 else:
 content_dict['margin-left'] = size_border_width_left + size_y_axis_width + size_y_axis_space
 if x_axis_position:
 content_dict['margin-top'] = size_header_height + size_x_axis_height + size_x_axis_space
 else:
 content_dict['margin-top'] = size_header_height
 content_dict['background'] = '#ffffff'
 content_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 content_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 content_dict['border-width'] = 1
 properties_structure['frame']['content'] = content_dict
 
 
 
 # processing blocks in the planning content
 for block_object in structure.planning.content:
 block_dict = None
 block_dict = {}
 block_dict['position'] = 'absolute'
 block_dict['border-style'] = 'solid'
 block_dict['border-color'] = '#53676e'
 block_dict['border-width'] = 1
 if block_object.error == 1: # task has error (not validated)
 block_dict['background'] = '#e4c4da'
 elif block_object.warning == 1: # other bloc in the same task has error
 block_dict['background'] = '#e9e3f0'
 elif block_object.property_dict['stat'] == 1: # stat
 block_dict['background'] = '#97b0c1'
 block_dict['border-color'] = '#97b0c1'
 elif block_object.color != '': # color specified
 block_dict['background'] = block_object.color
 else: # default color
 block_dict['background'] = '#bdd2e7'
 
 
 block_dict['width'] = block_object.position_x.relative_range * size_planning_width
 block_dict['height'] = block_object.position_y.relative_range * size_planning_height
 block_dict['margin-left'] = block_object.position_x.relative_begin * size_planning_width
 block_dict['margin-top'] = block_object.position_y.relative_begin * size_planning_height
 
 if block_object.parent_activity.property_dict['stat'] == 0:
 # the whole following process is aimed to take care of the non-stat blocks
 
 if structure.planning.main_axis == structure.planning.Y and block_object.parent_activity.property_dict['stat'] == 0:
 # Y axis is main axis
 # adapt Y block size
 block_dict['height'] = block_dict['height'] - 10
 block_dict['margin-top'] = block_dict['margin-top'] + 5
 elif block_object.parent_activity.property_dict['stat'] == 0:
 # X axis is main axis
 # adapt X block size
 block_dict['width'] = block_dict['width'] - 10
 block_dict['margin-left'] = block_dict['margin-left'] + 5
 
 # for each block processing its info objects and placing them
 # testing if there is enough room horizontally to display the info,
 # first checking when 2 info on the same line (top or bottom)
 top_string = ''
 top_list = []
 bot_string = ''
 bot_list = []
 center = ''
 # recovering full string that will have to be displayed on the top & bottom line()
 for info_name in block_object.info.keys():
 if 'top' in info_name:
 top_string += block_object.info[info_name].info
 top_list.append(info_name)
 if 'bot' in info_name:
 bot_string += block_object.info[info_name].info
 bot_list.append(info_name)
 if 'center' in info_name:
 center = info_name
 # checking if block length can fit them
 if (len(top_string) * car_width) > block_dict['width']:
 # block is too short, escaping top line
 for top_id in top_list:
 block_object.info[top_id].edit('.')
 if (len(bot_string) * car_width) > block_dict['width']:
 for bot_id in bot_list:
 block_object.info[bot_id].edit('.')
 # testing if need to update center info object (horizontal test)
 # as center info is automatically splitted into lines if necessary, need to check
 # the length of the biggest line.
 center_content_list = block_object.info[center].info.split(' ')
 center_length = 0
 for center_content_string in center_content_list:
 if center_length < len(center_content_string):
 center_length = len(center_content_string)
 # now center_length contains the maximum length of a line
 # applying test
 if center_length * car_width > block_dict['width']:
 # center length is too long, escaping it
 block_object.info[center].edit('__')
 
 # now testing vertical limit (..)
 # lines contains the nuber of 'lines' to display
 lines = 1 # center line is always present
 for list_object in (top_list,bot_list):
 if list_object is not (None,[]):
 lines += 1
 if block_dict['height'] < car_height:
 # there is no room to display any text in the block
